name: Reluctant Rampage
description:
Controls:

Hold Left Click to focus

Press Space to jump

This was a game made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam by two high schoolers. The theme was Out of Control so in our game you play as a friendly dragon whose body was taken over by an evil wizard to destroy a village. While the wizard controls your speed and attack, you can still stop him. By momentarily changing your direction and jumping to avoid your attack from hitting anybody, you can make your way to his tower while trying to leave as much of the village unharmed as possible.
